Articles.Content: Good to be on board. A sonofagun told me to download it and I did. Addictive little game!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Heh, thanks, but to be strictly truthful I\'m one of those job stealing immigrants. I\'m from the US, but I\'m half Hungarian.

...that said, I\'m not a gifted spaceplane designer - I had a List of Honor of Kerbalnauts who were killed in the line of duty, but someone mistook it for a roll of toilet paper and used half of it after a dodgy curry yesterday...
